ui.rule.async.mode.description:
For an Rule, if there are multiple actions, then these actions must be executed sequentially, also called synchronous execution. For multiple Rules, different strategies can be set for their execution, including asynchronous, synchronous, and synchronous with the same Rules.

1. asynchronous

Asynchronous refers to the parallel execution of different Rule actions

2. Synchronize

Synchronization refers to the synchronous execution of different Rule actions globally, and the two Rule are executed sequentially; note that due to the global nature, do not perform time-consuming actions in synchronous Rule (for example: extremely long delays, infinite loops) , otherwise other Rule may be blocked.

3. Synchronized exclusive

Similar to synchronization, the difference is that the scope is the same instruction, not global, and we will assign a dedicated executor to the Rule; it means that the same Rule will be executed synchronously, and different Rule will be executed asynchronously.

Command will be execute with su. 
Please make sure to allow ShortX start from Background.
ui.action.shell.single.shot.description:
Independent Execution: This mode opens a separate process for each shell command, preventing multiple commands from blocking each other.

Shell Process Reuse: In this mode, multiple shell commands share a single process and execute in a queue. If your shell commands are blocking, later commands may be unable to execute until the preceding ones finish.

(Note: This configuration only takes effect during actual execution of actions. During testing in the editing environment, independent processes are used for simulation.)
ui.action.delay.input.use.alarm.summary: A delay implemented without an Alarm may be inaccurate due to system hibernation after the screen is locked, and a delay implemented with an Alarm will wake up the system after the delay is completed, which may lead to increased power consumption. Please use this switch comprehensively

ui.subscription.subscribe.how.to.page:
### 激活码购买 有效期自购买日起算10年，一个激活码同一时刻仅能激活一台设备，支持换设备使用。 1. 支付**{priceCNY}** CNY ( **${priceUSD}** USD) 2. 发邮件至 **{mail}** 3. 邮件写 **{app_name}高级版本申请** 4. 加上带**支付订单号**的支付截图附件 5. 发送邮件 > Tips: > 我们会尽快回复高级版激活码，一般不会超过12小时； > 如果超时未收到请检查下垃圾箱，或者联系Q: {qq}； > 发邮件时可以使用QQ、163、gmail等邮箱，不要使用手机彩信、outlook邮箱。

### Google Play购买 **{app_name}** 已在Google Play发布，你可以前往购买下载；如果你已购买，可以通过下方验证按钮验证你的资格。
